classes.description: A fierce warrior of primal origins, fueled by rage and unmatched in melee combat.
A versatile spellcaster and performer who uses music and magic to inspire and enchant.
A divine spellcaster who serves a deity, capable of healing and wielding powerful spells.
A spellcaster connected to nature, capable of shapeshifting and summoning natural elements.
A master of weapons and combat tactics, adaptable to various fighting styles.
A martial artist who channels Ki for special abilities and excels in unarmed combat.
A holy warrior sworn to uphold justice and righteousness, combining martial prowess with divine magic.
A skilled tracker and hunter, often accompanied by an animal companion, specializing in ranged attacks and nature magic.
A cunning and stealthy character, proficient in skills like deception and thievery, often dealing high damage with sneak attacks.
A spellcaster who wields innate magical power, often tied to a magical bloodline.
A spellcaster who makes a pact with a powerful entity for spells and abilities, drawing on eldritch magic.
A scholarly spellcaster who studies arcane magic, capable of casting a wide variety of spells.
